ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Special Train Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c ,'Dimensional/Locomotive'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( NS_Type__c ,'Proposal')) , RecordType.Name!='NS Internal', NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, !OR( ISCHANGED(NS_InteractionReason__c), ISCHANGED(NS_InteractionReason__c) ) , ISBLANK( NS_Equipment__c ), NOT(ISCHANGED(NS_Last_Activity_Time__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(NS_Counter_Activity__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Equipment Number(s) prior to saving the Case.
